attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to raise the amount of money available to disabled persons who need their houses adapted, the £25,000 amount available at present is not enough, MP's need to realise todays cost, is much higher than when this grant was first introduced, they need to live in the real world

rejection.details: Can you incorporate the point of the petition into it's title
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
